question:
Which of the following rock-cut caves at Ajanta are Chaitya Grihas?
1) Cave number 9
2) Cave number 12
3) Cave number 19
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The finest examples of the art during the Gupta period are Ajanta caves. Out of the 31 rock-cut cave monuments at Ajanta, five are Chaitya Grihas. The five chaitya grihas are cave numbers 9, 10, 19, 26, and 29.
